meanings: production cost, prime cost, cost price
sell[offer] sth at its cost of production
reflect the cost increase in the price

vlive.korean: [종현이는 꼼꼼하게 원가를 따진 후 책정할 예정] 진짜요? [JR is carefully thinking about the costs] Really? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “JRTYLOG ③” (종현 : 태용)
vlive.english: [JR is carefully thinking about the costs] Really?

vlive.korean: [얘도 3,000원] 얘 3,000원에 팔면 원가가 안 되지 않아요? [This one too, 3000 won] Shouldn't we be charging more than 3000 won? 듣기 View video Dispatch : [ⓓxV] “JRTYLOG ③” (종현 : 태용)
vlive.english: [This one too, 3000 won] Shouldn't we be charging more than 3000 won?

vlive.korean: [진이는 노란 팀이었나...?] - 아니야, 이거 - 아니, 그냥... - 왜 원가... [Is Jin on Team Yellow?] - No. This is... - Just... - Cost price... 듣기 View video BTS : Run BTS! 2020 - EP.94
vlive.english: [Is Jin on Team Yellow?] - No. This is... - Just... - Cost price...

vlive.korean: 나 선글라스의 원가를 몰라요. I don't even know what the production cost is. 듣기 View video Hong Jin Young : 갓떼리언니 오랜만~♡
vlive.english: I don't even know what the production cost is.

vlive.korean: 프리마켓으로 원가에 팔겠습니다. I'll sell them at production price during the flea market. 듣기 View video Hong Jin Young : 갓떼리언니 오랜만~♡
vlive.english: I'll sell them at production price during the flea market.

examples.korean: You’d better do some costings. 발음듣기 원가 계산을 좀 해 보시는 게 좋겠군요. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: You’d better do some costings. 발음

examples.korean: Copies of the CD can be purchased at cost price. 발음듣기 이 시디 녹음본들을 원가에 구입할 수 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Copies of the CD can be purchased at cost price. 발음

examples.korean: goods sold at cost 발음듣기 원가에 파는 상품 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
PLP is expected to lower the production cost. 발음듣기 패널 레벨 패키징이 생산 원가를 낮출 것으로 기대된다. 국제영어대학원대학교 신어사전
examples.english: PLP is expected to lower the production cost. 발음

examples.korean: I had to determine which budgets should be cut within my division to yield an overall 5 percent cost reduction. 발음듣기 5%의 원가 절감을 위하여 우리 사업본부의 어떤 예산을 삭감할지 결정해야 했습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I had to determine which budgets should be cut within my division to yield an overall 5 percent cost reduction. 발음
